description:
A tool client of Insight Global is seeking a Remote Business Development Manager. The Business Development Manager will develop business plans and market chemical products to the Aircraft manufacturers and the maintenance segment of top-tier airlines, airline Maintenance, Repair and Operations providers (MROs). Territories will be worldwide. She/he/they will be a team player, be open to coaching and enlisting help from others, and will take ownership of every initiative she/he/they create(s). The Business Development Manager will get support from a global and experienced sales and marketing, product, and technical team.

Responsibilities:
• Partner with the Business Manager to create ITWPB (Celeste and LPS) growth strategy in the maintenance segment within aircraft manufacturers, airlines, key distributors, and MRO’s.
• Meet annual goals for new business and new products.
• Develop business plans to grow Specification approvals at key Aircraft Manufacturers (Boeing, Airbus Embraer)
• Conduct market studies in maintenance and MRO to identify the "80" opportunities for cleaning and degreasing new product development or new uses for existing products in maintenance / MROs .
• Grow business by executing self-driven initiatives or by executing opportunities found with account plans or in distributor partners, enlisting an internal and external team of cross-functional managers, such as sales manager, product managers, marketing managers, engineers, procurement managers, and other key players.
• Develop airlines’ maintenance contacts and build corresponding database and grow existing airline contacts in new segments through contacts, referrals, and LinkedIn.
• Track pipeline opportunities and conversion by utilizing Salesforce.
• Prepare pre call agenda and report outcomes.
• Identify customer needs and articulate those needs into new opportunities and products.
• Provide outlook for 12 months for any new business.

Requirements:
• Must have prior client relationships with Boeing and Airbus.
• 5+ years of experience in business development, marketing, or sales.

Salary

$110,000 - $130,000 + up to 30% Annual Bonus
